copyResourceFile()

copyResourceFile(string  $resourceFile, string  $targetDirectory, boolean  $overwrite = true)

Copy a file from the resource directoy to the target directory.

Parameters

string $resourceFile

The name of a resource file.
string $targetDirectory

The path of a target directory.
boolean $overwrite

true to overwrite the target file even if it exists. The default value is true.

Inherited from
\Authlete\Laravel\Console\AuthleteCommand
